creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with a chassis, some of which are associated with quite complex settings.

The driver usually has not adjusted the chassis optimally and therefore has less driving pleasure and also endangers his safety.

SAGLY helps the rider to find optimal settings for his bike and to continuously improve and document them.

Different setups can be created for different bikes and terrains.

These can be changed at any time, or different versions can be created.

In addition, the driver receives general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis.

Other functions that we would like to implement:

Sharing and evaluating suspension settings with and from other drivers.

Smart recommendations of suspension settings from other riders with similar build and good ratings.

Possibility for dealers to create a new setup and transmit it to the customer via QR code.

Easy-Setup-Guide: Based on the weight of the rider, the appropriate air pressure and rebound settings for the suspension element are suggested.
descriptionShort: MTB-SETTING MADE EASY

title: SAGLY - MTB Suspension Guide

creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with a chassis, some of which are associated with quite complex settings.

You usually have not adjusted the chassis optimally and therefore you have less riding pleasure and you also endanger your safety.

SAGLY helps you to find optimal settings for your mountain bike and to continuously improve and document them.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.

EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.

A better suspension setup on your mountain bike means not only more comfort and more safety but also more fun and also faster riding.

Why SAGLY?

Mountain biking is not only a sport, hobby or lifestyle in our opinion. We associate mountain biking with much more.

When you ride your mountain bike, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again.

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking.

SAGLY is developed with heart right next to the famous mountain bike park Leogang in Austria. The founders are also passionate mountain bikers and grew up riding bikes, riding trails, riding freeride downhill and enduro.

You will see that a great mountain bike chassis setup will make you more comfortable on the bike. Settings like Rebound, SAG, High speed compression, Low speed compression, High speed rebound, low speed rebound, compression, rebound, Hydraulic bottom out, Volume Spacers, Air Pressure, Tire pressure and much more can be saved and are therefore documented in your pocket.

Also an intuitive user interface guarantees a smooth user experience. Enjoy SAGLY, an innovative mobile app built from mountain bikers for mountain bikers.
descriptionShort: Mountain bike chassis setup tuning made easy. SAG calculator, document setting.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: [181] Bugs fixed

title: SAGLY - MTB Suspension setup

creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with a chassis, some of which are associated with quite complex settings.

You usually have not adjusted the chassis optimally and therefore you have less riding pleasure and you also endanger your safety.

SAGLY helps you to find optimal settings for your mountain bike and to continuously improve and document them.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.

EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.

A better suspension setup on your mountain bike means not only more comfort and more safety but also more fun and also faster riding.

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking.

SAGLY is developed with heart right next to the famous mountain bike park Leogang in Austria. The founders are also passionate mountain bikers and grew up riding bikes, riding trails, riding freeride downhill and enduro.

You will see that a great mountain bike chassis setup will make you more comfortable on the bike. Settings like Rebound, SAG, High speed compression, Low speed compression, High speed rebound, low speed rebound, compression, rebound, Hydraulic bottom out, Volume Spacers, Air Pressure, Tire pressure and much more can be saved and are therefore documented in your pocket.

Also an intuitive user interface guarantees a smooth user experience. Enjoy SAGLY, an innovative mobile app built from mountain bikers for mountain bikers.
descriptionShort: Mountain bike chassis setup tuning made easy. SAG calculator, document setting.

creator: SAGLY

MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with a chassis, some of which are associated with quite complex settings.

You usually have not adjusted the chassis optimally and therefore you have less riding pleasure and you also endanger your safety.

SAGLY helps you to find optimal settings for your mountain bike and to continuously improve and document them.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.

EXPLORE SETUPS

When you ride your mountain bike, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again.

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking.

SAGLY is developed with heart right next to the famous mountain bike park Leogang in Austria. The founders are also passionate mountain bikers and grew up riding bikes, riding trails, riding freeride downhill and enduro.

You will see that a great mountain bike chassis setup will make you more comfortable on the bike. Settings like Rebound, SAG, High speed compression, Low speed compression, High speed rebound, low speed rebound, compression, rebound, Hydraulic bottom out, Volume Spacers, Air Pressure, Tire pressure and much more can be saved and are therefore documented in your pocket.

Also an intuitive user interface guarantees a smooth user experience. Enjoy SAGLY, an innovative mobile app built from mountain bikers for mountain bikers.
descriptionShort: Mountain bike chassis setup tuning made easy. SAG calculator, document setting.

title: SAGLY - MTB Suspension setup

creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with a chassis, some of which are associated with quite complex settings.

You usually have not adjusted the chassis optimally and therefore you have less riding pleasure and you also endanger your safety.

SAGLY helps you to find optimal settings for your mountain bike and to continuously improve and document them.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.

EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.

When you ride your mountain bike, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again.

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking.

SAGLY is developed with heart right next to the famous mountain bike park Leogang in Austria. The founders are also passionate mountain bikers and grew up riding bikes, riding trails, riding freeride downhill and enduro.

You will see that a great mountain bike chassis setup will make you more comfortable on the bike. Settings like Rebound, SAG, High speed compression, Low speed compression, High speed rebound, low speed rebound, compression, rebound, Hydraulic bottom out, Volume Spacers, Air Pressure, Tire pressure and much more can be saved and are therefore documented in your pocket.

Also an intuitive user interface guarantees a smooth user experience. Enjoy SAGLY, built from mountain bikers for mountain bikers.
descriptionShort: Mountain bike settings tuning made easy. SAG calculator, document setting.

title: SAGLY - MTB Suspension setup

creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with parts, some of which have quite complex settings.

Most riders have not adjusted their forks, shocks, or tires optimally, but these settings can be crucial for a safe and pleasurable ride.

Tune, document, and compare your mountain bike settings with SAGLY.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups.

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.

EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.

FEEDBACK LOOP

SAGLY will keep in dialogue with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that new recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your setups. This also helps you in developing a better feeling for your suspension.

HISTORY FEATURE

Have a history of changes to track your progress on your setup.

Tune, document, and compare your mountain bike settings with SAGLY.


MTB SUSPENSION APP TO HAVE ALL YOUR MOUNTAIN BIKE SETTINGS IN YOUR POCKET

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.


BALANCE CHECK

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.


KNOW-HOW

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.


WHAT SHOULD I DO, WHEN ...

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.


EASY SETUP GUIDE

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.


EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.


FEEDBACK LOOP

SAGLY will keep in dialogue with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that new recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your setups. This also helps you in developing a better feeling for your suspension.


HISTORY FEATURE

Have a history of changes to track your progress on your setup.

Settings like Rebound, SAG, High speed compression, Low speed compression, High speed rebound, low speed rebound, compression, rebound, Hydraulic bottom out, Volume Spacers, Air Pressure, Tire pressure and much more can be saved and are therefore documented in your pocket. title: SAGLY - MTB Bike Trails Setup

creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
MTB s and E-MTB s are equipped with parts, some of which have quite complex settings.

Most riders have not adjusted their forks, shocks, or tires optimally, but these settings can be crucial for a safe and pleasurable ride.

Tune, document, and compare your mountain bike settings with SAGLY.

This is a MTB app to have all mountain bike settings in your pocket, also on bike trails. Setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the mtb setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet bike trail conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.


Balance check of the bike tracker SAGLY

The balance feature of the bike app checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your mountain bike suspension setup.


MTB Know-How

In addition, the you receive general MTB tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining your mountain bike.


What should I do, when ...

Another MTB feature supports you with solutions for problems with your mountain bike. So you can tune your mtb setup.


Easy setup guide

The Easy setup guide is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG method. You input the suspension mtb part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The Easy setup guide of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base mtb setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and trail riding terrain.


Explore setups

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.


Feedback loop

SAGLY will keep in touch with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that new recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your setups. This also helps you in developing a better feeling for your suspension.


History feature

Have a history of changes of your mountain bike settings.


Why SAGLY?

Mountain biking is not only a sport, hobby or lifestyle in our opinion. We associate mountain biking with much more.

When you ride your mountain bike, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again.

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking.

SAGLY is developed with heart right next to the famous mountain bike park Leogang in Austria. The founders are also passionate mountain bikers and grew up riding bikes, riding trails, riding freeride downhill and enduro.

You will see that a great mountain bike setup will make you more comfortable and faster on your mountain bike. A better suspension setup on your mountain bike means not only more comfort and more safety but also more fun and also faster riding.

SAGLY maintenance
You can connect SAGLY to Strava and set up maintenance intervals. Based on your riding hours or mileage in Strava you will get notified in SAGLY to execute a maintenance. You can inspect the progress of your maintenances.

The Easy setup guide is part of the Mtb suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the Sag method. You input the suspension mtb part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This Sag calculator calculates the Sag based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The Easy setup guide of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base mtb setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and trail riding terrain.


Explore setups and not only trail maps

Explore setups from other riders in the Mtb suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of likes, number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can likes those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.


Feedback loop

SAGLY will keep in touch with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your setups - All while mountain biking.


History feature

Have a history of all changes, maintenances and strava rides.


Why SAGLY?

Mountain biking is not only a sport, hobby or lifestyle in our opinion. We associate mountain biking trail riding with much more.

When you ride your mountain bike and not only a trek bicycle, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again.

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology is more than just a
bike gps app, it is a bike app for your mountain bike setting and maintenance.

SAGLY started as a Mtb Hobby and is developed with heart right next to the famous mountain bike park Leogang in Austria. The founders are also passionate mountain bikers and grew up mountain biking and go for a bike ride everyday.

Faster riding, longer bicycle lifetime, saving money and more fun. Start using SAGLY.

title:
SAGLY - MTB bike tracker
259375

creator: SAGLY
descriptionHtml:
Mtbs and Emtbs are equipped with parts, some of which have quite complex settings.
Most riders have not adjusted their forks, shocks, or tires optimally, but these settings can be crucial for a safe and pleasurable ride.
A better suspension setup on your mountain bike means not only more comfort and more safety but also more fun and also faster riding.
Moreover great mountain bike maintenance extends the lifetime of your mountain bike with this bike tracker SAGLY.
Save money, have more fun on your bike, ride safer and constantly become a better mountain biker with the SAGLY bike app.

* Mtb Suspension App to manage all your bikes - SAGLY
Mountain bike setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your MTB setups are shown in a nice and clear way. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

* Balance your mtb
The balance feature checks if your MTB setup is balanced between the rear and the front part of your mountain bike and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

* Know-how - Learn about your bike. Another feature which seperates SAGLY from apps like trailforks, trail forks, mtb project, komoot, kamoot, pinkbike
In the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the your mountainbike and mountain bike settings.

* What should I do, when ... helps you with solutions to problems with your mountain bike setup.
Another feature supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the mountain bike settings. In this way you can tune your mtb setup continuosly.

* Easy setup guide - Receive help with the initial setup of your bicycle
This feature is part of the Mtb suspension app SAGLY and guides you through a basic setup by using the SAG method. Also a tire pressure calculator is integrated, which generates the right air pressure based on your profile. Moreover an AI algorithm gives you the right settings of your suspension model in settings. Lastly also factory settings from the manufacturer are imported and suggested to you.

* Explore bike from other riders
Explore setups from other riders in the bicycle app SAGLY. Search for similar bikes, try out their settings or show off your mountainike with cool images.

* Offline support has you covered on remote mountain bike trails
It does not really matter where you are or how remote the trail is, you can make changes anytime on your setup and SAGLY synchronizes the changes as soon as you have internet again. Even if you find the remotest mtb trails on trail forks, komoot, strava, all trails, alltrails etc.

* SAGLY keeps in touch with you - The Feedback loop feature
Moreover SAGLY will keep in dialogue with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that new recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your mtb setups. This feature is based on the “Bracketing” method and helps you to find the perfect mountainbike settings and is used also in downhill world cup racing.

* Keep track of changes - The history for your bcycle
Have a history of changes to track your progress on your setup. See what feedback you added or what Strava rides you have done. This is the place to see what has changed.

* Mountainbike maintenance made easy - SAGLY is integrated with Strava mobile app
You can connect SAGLY to Strava and set up maintenance intervals. Based on your riding hours or mileage in Strava you will get notified in SAGLY to execute a maintenance. Always have an overview of the progress of your maintenances and keep track of them in the HISTORY feature. Moreover see how the maintenance is executed by having a manual displayed.

* Simple user interface
It is important to us that you have fun with the mountain bicycle app SAGLY through a great user experience. We are working hard on SAGLY and constant updates bring new features and improvements to the MTB app SAGLY.

Enjoy mountain biking and suspension tuning!
descriptionShort: Bicycle settings and maintenance made easy - Bcycle, mountain bike, downhill

Explore setups from other riders in the bicycle app SAGLY. Search for similar bikes, try out their settings or show off your mountainike with cool images.

* Offline support has you covered on remote mountain bike trails
It does not really matter where you are or how remote the trail is, you can make changes anytime on your setup and SAGLY synchronizes the changes as soon as you have internet again. Even if you find the remotest mtb trails on trail forks, komoot, strava, all trails, alltrails etc.

* SAGLY keeps in touch with you - The Feedback loop feature
Moreover SAGLY will keep in dialogue with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that new recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your mtb setups. This feature is based on the “Bracketing” method and helps you to find the perfect mountainbike settings and is used also in downhill world cup racing.

* Keep track of changes - The history for your bcycle
Have a history of changes to track your progress on your setup. See what feedback you added or what Strava rides you have done. This is the place to see what has changed.

* Mountainbike maintenance made easy - SAGLY is integrated with Strava mobile app
You can connect SAGLY to Strava and set up maintenance intervals. Based on your riding hours or mileage in Strava you will get notified in SAGLY to execute a maintenance. Always have an overview of the progress of your maintenances and keep track of them in the HISTORY feature. Moreover see how the maintenance is executed by having a manual displayed.

* Simple user interface
It is important to us that you have fun with the mountain bicycle app SAGLY through a great user experience. We are working hard on SAGLY and constant updates bring new features and improvements to the MTB app SAGLY.

Enjoy mountain biking and suspension tuning!

descriptionHtml:
SAGLY helps you to become a better rider overall. We believe becoming a better rider not only has to do with riding technique, but also with the maintenance of your mountain bike as well as the suspension setup.

Most rider do not have the suspension of their bike optimized and maintain their bike properly. Moreover riders do not train their skills specifically and systematically and therefore do not exploit their riding skill potential fully.

With SAGLY you will:

- Increase your safety when riding
- Have more fun on your bike and improve your riding skills
- Safe money by maintaining and adjusting your bike properly

Here a list of all available features:

* Mtb Suspension App to manage all your bikes - SAGLY
Mountain bike setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your MTB setups are shown in a nice and clear way. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

* Mountain bike riding trainings feature
Have many different trainings for improving your riding in the app. Moreover create a personalized training schedule and learn with video, audio and text based guides. Receive feedback at the end of each training with the AI video check and keep improving your riding technique.

* Know-how - Learn about your bike. Another feature which seperates SAGLY from apps like trailforks, trail forks, mtb project, komoot, kamoot, pinkbike
In the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the your mountainbike and mountain bike settings.

* What should I do, when ... helps you with solutions to problems with your mountain bike setup.
Another feature supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the mountain bike settings. In this way you can tune your mtb setup continuosly.

* Easy setup guide - Receive help with the initial setup of your bike
This feature is part of the Mtb suspension app SAGLY and guides you through a basic setup by using the SAG method. Also a tire pressure calculator is integrated, which generates the right air pressure based on your profile. Moreover an AI algorithm gives you the right settings of your suspension model in settings. Lastly also factory settings from the manufacturer are imported and suggested to you.

* Explore bike from other riders
Explore setups from other riders in the Mtb app SAGLY. Search for similar bikes, try out their settings or show off your mountainike with cool images.

* Offline support has you covered on remote mountain bike trails
It does not really matter where you are or how remote the trail is, you can make changes anytime on your setup and SAGLY synchronizes the changes as soon as you have internet again. Even if you find the remotest mtb trails on trail forks, komoot, strava, all trails, alltrails etc.

* Keep track of changes - The history
Have a history of changes to track your progress on your setup. See what feedback you added or what Strava rides you have done. This is the place to see what has changed.

* Mountainbike maintenance made easy - SAGLY is integrated with Strava mobile app
You can connect SAGLY to Strava and set up maintenance intervals. Based on your riding hours or mileage in Strava you will get notified in SAGLY to execute a maintenance. Always have an overview of the progress of your maintenances and keep track of them in the HISTORY feature. Moreover see how the maintenance is executed by having a manual displayed.

* Simple user interface
It is important to us that you have fun with the mountain bicycle app SAGLY through a great user experience. We are working hard on SAGLY and constant updates bring new features and improvements to the MTB app SAGLY.
